Bash(git -C "C:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add language toggle to login page and mobile header

- Globe icon on login page top bar \(next to server status\)
- Globe icon in mobile header for easy language switching
- Consistent toggle pattern across all views

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add continuous document processing scheduler

- New scheduler job runs every 2 minutes to process pending documents
- MAX_CONCURRENT_DOCUMENT_PROCESSING = 3 to avoid overload
- Admin endpoint /admin/reprocess-documents to manually trigger
- Admin endpoint /admin/pending-documents to list stuck docs
- Admin UI button to reprocess documents with pending count

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "C:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" add backend_v2/services/health_agents.py backend_v2/routers/health.py backend_v2/routers/admin.py frontend_v2/src/pages/Admin.jsx)

Bash(git -C "C:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add language support for AI health reports

- Health agents now accept language parameter \(default: Romanian\)
- AI prompts include language instructions to generate localized reports
- User''s language preference is used when running health analysis
- Admin endpoint /admin/regenerate-health-reports to regenerate all reports
- Admin UI button to trigger report regeneration in user''s preferred language

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add hardware awareness guidelines to CLAUDE.md

Document concurrency limits and best practices for background jobs
to prevent overloading the server.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add server monitoring and auto-restart with systemd

- Created systemd service with Restart=always for auto-recovery
- Admin endpoints: /server-logs, /service-status, /restart-server
- Admin UI shows service status, uptime, memory, recent restart events
- View server logs with error highlighting
- Manual restart button with confirmation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
